analysis.description: index in SirinCrowdsale.deleteGrantee (/unique_chucks/34/0x313f29ea49a9e6ca3b3e254335d4ec32ef5045f8.sol#1072-1075) is a local variable never initialiazed

RefundVault.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/34/0x313f29ea49a9e6ca3b3e254335d4ec32ef5045f8.sol#662-686) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(investor,tokensToClaim) (/unique_chucks/34/0x313f29ea49a9e6ca3b3e254335d4ec32ef5045f8.sol#680-682)

RefundVault.claimAllInvestorTokensByOwner (/unique_chucks/34/0x313f29ea49a9e6ca3b3e254335d4ec32ef5045f8.sol#699-706) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(investor,depositedTokenValue) (/unique_chucks/34/0x313f29ea49a9e6ca3b3e254335d4ec32ef5045f8.sol#702)

SirinCrowdsale.finalization has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.issue(presaleGranteesMapKeys[i],presaleGranteesMap[presaleGranteesMapKeys[i]]) (/unique_chucks/34/0x313f29ea49a9e6ca3b3e254335d4ec32ef5045f8.sol#986-987)
